item.title: Update
item.description: More details to come as my profile is reviewed for release! Contact Information Contact Information Connect with me on LinkedIn or check out my projects on GitHub.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Professional Profile I am currently a Cyber Warfare Technician in the United States Navy. I will have been serving for 8 years at the end of my contract and am looking to start an internship in February 2025 or a full-time position in June 2025. I have worked in both defensive and offensive cybersecurity positions, specializing in data analysis and software development.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Professional Experience and Skills Professional Experience Cryptologic Technician (Networks) First Class (E6), United States Navy Duration: July 2017 - Present Dedicated 200 hours in the development and testing of a vital host collection tool. Creation included data collection, transfer over network, cleaning, parsing, and presenting findings to stakeholders. Authored 10 Risk Mitigation Plans summarizing 4.22TB of data across 35,166 assets providing insight on 95,369 compliance and 112,293 vulnerability findings to stakeholders and network owners.
